# Results

## Our sample

```{r}
penguins |> 
  group_by(species) |> 
  summarize(
    mean(bill_dep, na.rm = TRUE), 
    sd(bill_dep, na.rm = TRUE), 
    n()
  ) |> 
  knitr::kable(
    col.names = c(
      "Species",
      "Mean Bill length (mm)", 
      "Standard Deviation Bill Length (mm)", 
      "Number in Sample"
    )
  )
```
